alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 19 at 2:56AM MDT until May 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Snowy and South Laramie Ranges including Centennial, Albany, Buford, Pumpkin Vine, Vedauwoo, Whitaker, Federal, and Horse Creek. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
